name: Combo Window
description:
NOTE: The downloadable version is the intended way to play the game! In it the game window expands as you progress, but itch.io messes with the scaling on the web build. - Jam info -

Made in 3 hours and 50 minutes for Trijam #209 with the theme Thin Borders which I incorporated into my game by having the game window (and as a result the arena) expand as you progress.

Tools used: Pygame, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil

- About -

Perform attacks by following the movements of your cards.

Adapt to the changing playing field as the game window expands along with the arena.

And survive as long as you can!

- Controls -

WASD or Arrow Keys
